heroes.name: npc_dota_hero_chen
heroes.bio_loc:
Born in the godless Hazhadal Barrens, Chen came of age among the outlaw tribes who eked out an existence in the shimmering heat of the desert. Using an ancient form of animal enthrallment, Chen's people husbanded the hardy desert locuthi, a stunted species of burrowing dragon that melted desert sands into tubes of glass where twice-a-year rains collected. Always on the edge of starvation and thirst, fighting amongst their neighbors and each other, Chen's clan made the mistake, one fateful day, of ambushing the wrong caravan.

In the vicious battle that followed, Chen's clan was outmatched. The armored Knights of the Fold made short work of the enthralled locuthi, who attacked and died in waves. With their dragons dead, the tribesmen followed. Chen struggled, and slashed, and clawed, and perished--or would have. Defeated, on his knees, he faced his execution with humility, offering his neck to the blade. Moved by Chen's obvious courage, the executioner halted his sword. Instead of the blade, Chen was given a choice: death or conversion. Chen took to the faith with a ferocity. He joined the Fold and earned his armor one bloody conversion at a time. Now, with the fanaticism of a convert, and with his powers of animal enthrallment at their peak, he seeks out unbelievers and introduces them to their final reward.
heroes.hype_loc: Converting the creatures of the forest to his cause, Chen leads his makeshift armies to aid his team in battle. He assaults enemies with beasts while sending friends to safety. Then, when things seem darkest, he heals his allies wherever they may be.
heroes.npe_desc_loc: Converts creeps to his cause, building an army

facets.description_loc: Summon Convert calls forth either a Centaur Courser or Centaur Conqueror.
facets.name: chen_centaur_convert

facets.description_loc: Summon Convert calls forth either a Hellbear or Hellbear Smasher.
facets.name: chen_hellbear_convert

facets.description_loc: Summon Convert calls forth either a Hill Troll or Dark Troll Summoner.
facets.name: chen_troll_convert

facets.description_loc: Summon Convert calls forth either a Satyr Mindstealer or Satyr Tormenter.
facets.name: chen_satyr_convert

facets.description_loc: Summon Convert calls forth either a Marshmage Apprentice or a Marshmage.
facets.name: chen_frog_convert

abilities.name: chen_penitence
abilities.desc_loc: Damages enemy unit, forces it to move slower and lets allies attack it more quickly.
abilities.lore_loc: Although Chen's brand of animal enthrallment isn't quite strong enough to control the minds of enemy heroes, it still tests their resolve in combat.

abilities.name: chen_holy_persuasion
abilities.desc_loc: Chen takes control of an enemy or neutral creep and receives a percentage of its bounty. Its maximum health is set to %health_min% + %bonus_health_per_level% per Chen Level. Converted creeps will have increased movement speed and bonus damage.
abilities.lore_loc: Although they may not be knights, Chen incorporates beasts into the Fold in the same way he himself was converted.
notes_loc: Persuading a new creep above max unit count causes the oldest persuaded creep to die.
Can target Ancient creeps when Chen has Aghanim's Shard.
The health of creeps already under Chen's control does not update to the new level upon leveling Holy Persuasion further.
Fully restores the creep's mana upon converting.
abilities.shard_loc: Allows Holy Persuasion to target Ancient creeps. Can control up to 1/2/3 Ancient creeps based on Hand of God's level. Additionally levels up some abilities of creeps by 1 level.

abilities.name: chen_divine_favor
abilities.desc_loc:
Passively provides an aura that grants increased health regeneration. Can be cast on allies to provide them with bonus armor and increasing the healing and health regeneration they receive.

If cast on Chen, all units controlled by Chen receive the buff and will be teleported to him. Taking damage from enemy heroes or their units will cancel the teleport.
abilities.lore_loc: Chen's zeal is infectious, blessing his allies with vitality and compelling them to his side.

abilities.name: chen_summon_convert
abilities.desc_loc:
Chen summons a convert to fight for him. The convert gains bonuses from Holy Persuasion and dies if Chen dies. Its maximum health is set to %health_min% + %bonus_health_per_level% per Chen Level.

The spell stays on cooldown while the convert is alive, but refreshes whenever Chen respawns. The Convert counts towards Holy Persuasion max unit count. The Convert's ability level increases with Chen's level of Holy Persuasion.
abilities.lore_loc: Chen's true strength is knowing which forces to call upon in battle.
facets_loc: Summon Convert calls forth either a Centaur Courser or Centaur Conqueror.
Summon Convert calls forth either a Giant Wolf or Alpha Wolf.
Summon Convert calls forth either a Hellbear or Hellbear Smasher.
Summon Convert calls forth either a Hill Troll or Dark Troll Summoner.
Summon Convert calls forth either a Satyr Mindstealer or Satyr Tormenter.
Summon Convert calls forth either a Marshmage Apprentice or a Marshmage.

abilities.name: chen_hand_of_god
abilities.desc_loc: Heals all allied heroes on the map as well as all units under Chen's control. A large heal is applied at first and a slow heal over time is applied for %hot_duration% seconds afterwards.
abilities.lore_loc: Using the mental link with his thralls, Chen calls down restoration and well-being to those who share his fanaticism.
notes_loc: Can heal invulnerable and hidden/banished allies.
abilities.scepter_loc: Decreases the cooldown of Hand of God to %AbilityCooldown%s and it becomes a chanelled spell that lasts for up to %AbilityChannelTime% seconds. The initial heal happens at the start of the channel, and while channeling other nearby allied units become debuff immune with %debuff_immune_resist%%% magic resistance and the power of the heal over time is increased by %nearby_hot_boost%%%.

talents.name: special_bonus_unique_chen_12
talents.name_loc: Hand of God applies a Strong Dispel

talents.name: special_bonus_unique_chen_2
talents.name_loc: Hand of God Fully Heals Chen and His Creeps
talents.desc_loc: Initial Heal fully heals. Heal over time is still applied.
